content: switch back excess water by rolling the socks inside a to smaller needles if preferred and knit to end towel let dry flat or on sock blockers weave of the round with cc in ends work in stockinette stitch with cc until foot measures approximately 4 4 5 5 cm / 1½ 1¾ 2 inches less than the desired final abbreviations length cc contrast colour co cast on k knit chart b k2tog knit 2 sts together mc main colour p - purl p2tog purl 2 sts together round s round s rs right side sl slip sm slip marker ssk slip slip knit st s stitch es ws wrong side wyif with yarn in front yo yarn over dreaming of happiness page 4/4
